nodes.documentation:
@title Proxy Factory - Allows to create new proxy contact and execute a message call to the new proxy within one transaction.
 @author Stefan George - <stefan@gnosis.pm>
nodes.name: ProxyFactory
createProxy

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows to retrieve the runtime code of a deployed Proxy. This can be used to check that the expected Proxy was deployed.
nodes.name: proxyRuntimeCode

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows to retrieve the creation code used for the Proxy deployment. With this it is easily possible to calculate predicted address.
nodes.name: proxyCreationCode
createProxyWithNonce

nodes.documentation:
@title Proxy Factory - Allows to create new proxy contact and execute a message call to the new proxy within one transaction.
 @author Stefan George - <stefan@gnosis.pm>
nodes.name: ProxyFactory
createProxy

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows to retrieve the runtime code of a deployed Proxy. This can be used to check that the expected Proxy was deployed.
nodes.name: proxyRuntimeCode

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows to retrieve the creation code used for the Proxy deployment. With this it is easily possible to calculate predicted address.
nodes.name: proxyCreationCode
createProxyWithNonce

devdoc.author: Stefan George - <stefan@gnosis.pm>

createProxy(address,bytes).details: Allows to create new proxy contact and execute a message call to the new proxy within one transaction.

params.data: Payload for message call sent to new proxy contract.

createProxyWithNonce(address,bytes,uint2.details: Allows to create new proxy contact and execute a message call to the new proxy within one transaction.

params.initializer: Payload for message call sent to new proxy contract.
params.saltNonce: Nonce that will be used to generate the salt to calculate the address of the new proxy contract.

proxyCreationCode().details: Allows to retrieve the creation code used for the Proxy deployment. With this it is easily possible to calculate predicted address.

proxyRuntimeCode().details: Allows to retrieve the runtime code of a deployed Proxy. This can be used to check that the expected Proxy was deployed.

devdoc.title: Proxy Factory - Allows to create new proxy contact and execute a message call to the new proxy within one transaction.
